events.name: EV Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_description: The manufacturing process of EV batteries comprises several stages, including material mining, raw material processing, battery cell components manufacturing, battery pack production, battery re-use, and battery recycling.
events.description: The manufacturing process of EV batteries comprises several stages, including material mining, raw material processing, battery cell components manufacturing, battery pack production, battery re-use, and battery recycling.

events.name: Material Mining
events.wd_description: Material mining involves extracting indispensable materials such as lithium, nickel, cobalt, graphite, and manganese, which are crucial for manufacturing lithium-ion batteries (LBs).
events.description: Material mining involves extracting indispensable materials such as lithium, nickel, cobalt, graphite, and manganese, which are crucial for manufacturing lithium-ion batteries (LBs).

events.name: Lithium Mining
events.wd_description: Lithium is extracted from brine and hard-rock deposits, with major sources in Bolivia, Argentina, Chile, and Australia.
events.description: Lithium is extracted from brine and hard-rock deposits, with major sources in Bolivia, Argentina, Chile, and Australia.

events.name: Nickel Mining
events.wd_description: Nickel is extracted from sulfide and laterite deposits, with significant sources in Russia, Canada, Australia, Indonesia, and the Philippines.
events.description: Nickel is extracted from sulfide and laterite deposits, with significant sources in Russia, Canada, Australia, Indonesia, and the Philippines.

events.name: Cobalt Mining
events.wd_description: Cobalt is primarily mined as a by-product of nickel and copper mining, with major producers including the Democratic Republic of Congo and Switzerland.
events.description: Cobalt is primarily mined as a by-product of nickel and copper mining, with major producers including the Democratic Republic of Congo and Switzerland.

events.name: Graphite Mining
events.wd_description: Graphite, used for battery anodes, is primarily mined in China, with additional sources in Tanzania, Mozambique, Canada, and Madagascar.
events.description: Graphite, used for battery anodes, is primarily mined in China, with additional sources in Tanzania, Mozambique, Canada, and Madagascar.

events.name: Manganese Mining
events.wd_description: Manganese is widely available and primarily mined in South Africa, Australia, Gabon, and China.
events.description: Manganese is widely available and primarily mined in South Africa, Australia, Gabon, and China.

events.name: Raw Material Processing
events.wd_description: The raw materials undergo intense processing involving heat and chemical treatment to transform them into battery-grade chemicals like lithium carbonate, lithium hydroxide, and nickel sulphate.
events.description: The raw materials undergo intense processing involving heat and chemical treatment to transform them into battery-grade chemicals like lithium carbonate, lithium hydroxide, and nickel sulphate.

events.name: Lithium Processing
events.wd_description: Lithium is processed into lithium carbonate and lithium hydroxide, essential for different battery chemistries.
events.description: Lithium is processed into lithium carbonate and lithium hydroxide, essential for different battery chemistries.

events.name: Nickel Processing
events.wd_description: Nickel is processed using methods like high-pressure acid leaching (HPAL) to produce battery-grade nickel.
events.description: Nickel is processed using methods like high-pressure acid leaching (HPAL) to produce battery-grade nickel.

events.name: Cobalt Processing
events.wd_description: Cobalt is processed to produce chemicals like cobalt sulphate, essential for battery production.
events.description: Cobalt is processed to produce chemicals like cobalt sulphate, essential for battery production.

events.name: Graphite Processing
events.wd_description: Graphite is processed into spherical forms for natural graphite and synthesized for synthetic graphite.
events.description: Graphite is processed into spherical forms for natural graphite and synthesized for synthetic graphite.

events.name: Manganese Processing
events.wd_description: Manganese is processed to produce battery-grade manganese.
events.description: Manganese is processed to produce battery-grade manganese.

events.name: Battery Cell Components Manufacturing
events.wd_description: Manufacturing battery cell components involves producing cathodes, anodes, electrolytes, and separators through sophisticated chemical processing and process engineering.
events.description: Manufacturing battery cell components involves producing cathodes, anodes, electrolytes, and separators through sophisticated chemical processing and process engineering.

events.name: Cathode Manufacturing
events.wd_description: Cathode materials undergo multiple processes using specialized syntheses, with major manufacturers holding a significant market share.
events.description: Cathode materials undergo multiple processes using specialized syntheses, with major manufacturers holding a significant market share.

events.name: Anode Manufacturing
events.wd_description: Anode materials, primarily graphite, are processed naturally or synthetically, with significant production concentrated in China.
events.description: Anode materials, primarily graphite, are processed naturally or synthetically, with significant production concentrated in China.

events.name: Electrolyte Manufacturing
events.wd_description: Electrolytes consist of salts and solvents, requiring synthesis and mixing, with specialized production.
events.description: Electrolytes consist of salts and solvents, requiring synthesis and mixing, with specialized production.

events.name: Separator Manufacturing
events.wd_description: Separators are microporous membranes often coated with ceramic to improve EV safety, produced by specialized manufacturers.
events.description: Separators are microporous membranes often coated with ceramic to improve EV safety, produced by specialized manufacturers.

events.name: Battery Pack Production
events.wd_description: Battery packs are produced through electrode manufacturing and cell fabrication, involving cleanroom conditions and significant capital investment.
events.description: Battery packs are produced through electrode manufacturing and cell fabrication, involving cleanroom conditions and significant capital investment.

events.name: Electrode Manufacturing
events.wd_description: Electrode manufacturing involves producing electrodes for battery cells under highly controlled conditions.
events.description: Electrode manufacturing involves producing electrodes for battery cells under highly controlled conditions.

events.name: Cell Fabrication
events.wd_description: Cell fabrication requires cleanroom conditions to avoid impurities, with the final product being integrated into battery packs.
events.description: Cell fabrication requires cleanroom conditions to avoid impurities, with the final product being integrated into battery packs.

events.name: Battery Re-Use
events.wd_description: Batteries are refurbished for second-life applications such as stationary storage, involving disassembly, reassessment, and repackaging.
events.description: Batteries are refurbished for second-life applications such as stationary storage, involving disassembly, reassessment, and repackaging.

events.name: Battery Recycling
events.wd_description: Three main methods are used for lithium-ion battery recycling: pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, and bioleaching, with emerging direct recycling methods.
events.description: Three main methods are used for lithium-ion battery recycling: pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, and bioleaching, with emerging direct recycling methods.

events.name: Pyrometallurgical
events.wd_description: This method involves melting the battery in a hot furnace to recover some of the cathode metals, using extreme heat to transform metal oxides into alloys.
events.description: This method involves melting the battery in a hot furnace to recover some of the cathode metals, using extreme heat to transform metal oxides into alloys.

events.name: Hydrometallurgical
events.wd_description: This method involves using aqueous solutions to leach metals out from the cathode substance through specialized solution reagents.
events.description: This method involves using aqueous solutions to leach metals out from the cathode substance through specialized solution reagents.

events.name: Bioleaching
events.wd_description: This method uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals, which is challenging due to the time required for bacterial growth and contamination risks.
events.description: This method uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals, which is challenging due to the time required for bacterial growth and contamination risks.

events.name: Direct Recycling
events.wd_description: Direct recycling involves dismantling anode and cathode components, followed by maintenance, processing, and production for reuse.
events.description: Direct recycling involves dismantling anode and cathode components, followed by maintenance, processing, and production for reuse.
